post.text:
"It's a good thing Trump isn't in charge of the law in this country." -Hillary Clinton

"Yeah, because you'd be in jail." -Donald Trump

comment.author: Jason
comment.text: Hilary won hands down. Again he was rude and arrogant. Classic own goals like, not in line with Pence, said he knew nothing about Russia and his dreadful grubby response to his disgraceful comments caught on tape. Dismissing it as 'locker room talk'. This man is a grub and luckily there are enough sensible people in the US who wont vote for him.

replies.author: Kasandra
replies.text: Yes because we wouldn't want to hurt anyone's feeling.

replies.author: Jason
replies.text: Calling a racial group racists or saying you would grab a woman's Pussy is way beyond hurting anyone's feelings. I am surprised some people can't see that.

replies.author: Samuel
replies.text: Jason... You must have ran out of testosterone many years ago brother.
